questions.question: What is the primary reason for determining the heat of hydration of cement?

answers.a: To measure the setting time of cement
answers.b: To prevent thermal cracking in concrete
answers.c: To determine the fineness of cement
answers.d: To improve the workability of cement

What type of reaction is the hydration of cement?

answers.c: To control the rapid heat and reaction of C₃A

questions.question: What is the ideal temperature for conducting a heat of hydration test?

questions.question: Why is the heat of hydration significant in mass concrete structures?

answers.a: It helps in increasing setting time
answers.b: It prevents early-age cracking due to excessive heat
answers.d: It allows for faster strength gain
